recordTypes.name: Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a building permit from the Town of Narragansett, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a demolition permit from the Town of Narragansett.

recordTypes.name: Hot Work Permit
recordTypes.description:
This Hot Work Permit is required for any operation involving open flame or producing heat and/or sparks. This work includes, but is not limited to, welding, brazing, cutting, grinding, soldering, thawing pipe, torch-applied roofing, or chemical welding.  

Seek an alternative/safer method if possible!

THIS PERMIT IS GOOD FOR ONE DAY ONLY!

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for an electrical permit from the Town of Narragansett, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Mobile Food Establishment
recordTypes.description: Apply for a Mobile Food Establishment (MFE) license with the Town of Narragansett.

recordTypes.name: Alcohol License
recordTypes.description: Renew or Apply for an Alcohol license from the Town of Narragansett, RI.

recordTypes.name: Mechanical Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a mechanical permit from the Town of Narragansett, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Residential Smoke & Carbon Monoxide
recordTypes.description: Apply for a Residential Smoke and Carbon Monoxide inspection when the house is being sold.

recordTypes.name: Tent Permit
recordTypes.description: This application must be submitted at least 7 days in advance of the event.  If you have an urgent request, please call

recordTypes.name: Permanent expansion of COVID-19 "Take it Outside" Seating/Dining
recordTypes.description: Application for Permanent expansion of the COVID-19 "Take it Outside" Seating/Dining.

recordTypes.name: 1 Day Licenses
recordTypes.description: Apply for a 1 Day licenses from the Town of Narragansett

recordTypes.name: Private Haulers
recordTypes.description: Apply for your Private Hauler or Septage Hauler license.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a plumbing permit from the Town of Narragansett, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Rental Registration
recordTypes.description: Complete the Rental Registration Application for your rental properties.

recordTypes.name: General Business Licenses
recordTypes.description: Apply for your Business licenses from the Town of Narragansett.

recordTypes.name: NEW Life Safety Inspection
recordTypes.description: Click here to submit your request for an inspection from the Narragansett Fire Prevention Bureau (related to business licenses or alcohol licenses)

recordTypes.name: Solar Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a solar permit from the Town of Narragansett.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Certificate
recordTypes.description: Apply for the Zoning Certificate with the Town of Narragansett.

recordTypes.name: Public Works - Right of Way Contractors License Application
recordTypes.description: Apply for a Right of Way Contractors License with the Town of Narragansett.

recordTypes.name: Public Works - General Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Apply for a Right of Way Construction Permit with the Town of Narragansett.

recordTypes.name: Special Events License
recordTypes.description: Apply for a special events license through the Town of Narragansett.

categories.name: Building Department
categories.content:
Submit one form to apply for permits (including Fire Plan Review, if applicable).

For questions, please contact the Narragansett Building Inspectors Office at 401-782-0619
